= Carlon Amoffel =
Race: Human

Sex: Male

Class: Unknown

== Description ==
Found buried to his neck in the dirt with the words "Oathbreaker" painted on his forehead.

After asking him about the [[../Cult of the Dragon|Cult of the Dragon]], he muttered something indicating membership to [[../The Harpers|The Harpers]].
He was tracking a shipment of stolen goods. Travelers (cultists) grew suspicious of him.
Cultists manufactured a story that he was passing information to the bandits.
